entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 7:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: 5.4°C
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 5.4°C
Wind: SSW 36 km/h gust 60 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow or rain changing to periods of rain this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 130 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early this evening. Wind becoming south 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain except freezing rain over higher terrain overnight. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
